author: remm
msg: - Fix bug 12521. The check is reversed.
- Submitted by Gabriele Garuglieri <gabriele.garuglieri at infoblu.it>

author: remm
msg: - Case sensitivity check will always be made, based on the value of the flag,
- Add a flag to allow sym linking.
- I'll wait to port the patch to 5.0 based on the feedback.

author: remm
msg: - Relax the writer use policy to allow including files with unknown
MIME types, which in that case will be assumed to be text. This is to make
Tomcat more user friendly, although this has potential for some misuse.
- Patch submitted by Tim Funk <funkman at joedog.org>

author: remm
msg: - Contexts created were not properly configured. Now, they are deployed in the
same way they would be if they were read from server.xml.
